channel.title: 🏢 School of Data Science, the Chinese University of Hong Kong (Shenzhen) on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 School of Data Science, the Chinese University of Hong Kong (Shenzhen) on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: HyperLogic: Enhancing Diversity and Accuracy in Rule Learning with HyperNets
item.description: HyperLogic uses hypernetworks to generate diverse, accurate, and concise rule sets from neural networks, enhancing both interpretability and accuracy in rule learning.
